text: Rick: I didn't expect that I would be able to come back alive... I should also do something in the next time. I should do some prepare, After the Zuan come, that's the best time for me to purify the world...

commander::it contains a kind of information virus, the headquarters hopes that you can go to Zaun again and upload this virus to the Their information center, this is our last chance to win, are you confident to complete it?
Haoyue: Make sure to complete the mission! Also, Commander, I wish to go on a mission alone....
Commander: Your courage to take on everything alone reminds me of a person.... Besides, the military has recently developed a combat armor. Can effectively combat 'discipline', you  bring it.

Rick:  you have such an idea, Zhao Feng. It doesn't make me feel safe even you died. That's all, I'll go there too, I must not let him succeed, otherwise the fruits of victory will not be very easy to get...
